fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a target, and a GIF (from Discord's GIF search thing) of your choice. The host will post that image in the target's player channel without any context.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only communicate via GIFS from Discord's GIF search, even in your own private channel.
- You GIFs *can* have text on them. :)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure you successfully have a conversation with at least four unique people and survive until the end of the game.
